import React, { useCallback, useEffect } from 'react' import './Header.css' import logo from 'assets/images/logo.png' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { logout } from 'redux/actions/userAction' function Header() { const dispatch = useDispatch() const { isLogin, userInfo } = useSelector((state) => state.userReducers) const handleLogout = useCallback(() => { dispatch(logout()) }, [dispatch]) useEffect(() => { const navLinks = document.getElementById('nav-links') const navClose = document.getElementById('nav-close') navLinks.style.display = 'none' navClose.style.display = 'none' console.log('vao day ') const hamburger = document.getElementById('hamburger') hamburger.addEventListener('toggle', (event) => { console.log(event) navLinks.style.display = 'block' navClose.style.display = 'block' }) }, []) return (
TaroInJapan
